pane.title: Upload
pane.description: Set up uploading services and preferences.

help_texts.disable-download-logging: Disable logging every download made by users of your forum. Keeping it enabled allows you to view the number of downloads and other metrics in the nearby future.
help_texts.disable-hotlink-protection: Hotlink protection prevents opening downloads from other sites. Current method requires a csrf token and post id.
help_texts.download_templates: Download templates are how uploads are shown on your forum, eg like previews, buttons. Currently available:
help_texts.mime_types: Please configure your mapping here. Each mime type regular expression will be handled by a specific upload adapter and download template.
help_texts.resize: Choose whether you want to resize your images before they get uploaded. You can choose a maximum width and height, in pixels. The resizing process keeps the aspect ratio of the images.
help_texts.client_extension:
By default Upload will choose a safe file extension based on the MIME type.
For some file types based around ZIP or binary data this can result in generic extensions being used instead of the expected one.
Here you can enter a comma-separated list of file extensions that will be kept verbatim.
help_texts.watermark: Choose whether images will have a watermark added during upload. Watermarks are added to non-gifs based on your preferences below.
help_texts.s3_compatible_storage: The following settings are only required when using S3 compatible storage. If you use AWS, you can leave them blank.
help_texts.s3_acl: The ACL that should be applied to the uploaded object (default: private). For possible values, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/acl-overview.html#canned-acl
help_texts.composer_buttons: By default both the media manager button and upload button are visible. You can also choose to display only one button.

preferences.mime_types: Configure your mime type, upload adapter mapping
preferences.title: General preferences

templates.file_description: Shows the file name and some general information. Proxies downloads through php, allowing for statistics gathering and hotlink protection.
templates.image-preview_description: Shows the complete image in-line. No download functionality, no statistics are gathered and hotlink protection is ignored.
templates.image_description: Shows a thumbnail of the image and proxies download through php. Allowing statistics to be gathered and hotlink protection.
templates.just-url_description: Inserts just the URL. Rendering can be handled by other extensions with auto-link ability. No download functionality, no statistics are gathered and hotlink protection is ignored.

file_list.release_to_upload: Μετακινήστε το αρχείο εδώ για μεταφόρτωση
file_list.modal_empty_desktop: Η λίστα των αρχείων σας είναι κενή. Κάντε κλικ στο κουμπί ή σύρετε ένα αρχείο εδώ για μεταφόρτωση.
file_list.modal_empty_phone: Η λίστα αρχείων σας είναι κενή. Πατήστε το παραπάνω κουμπί για να ανεβάσετε ένα αρχείο.

hide_file.hide_confirmation: Είστε σίγουρος ότι θέλετε να αποκρύψετε το αρχείο "{fileName}"? Η απόκρυψη ενός αρχείου θα το καταργήσει μόνο από την διαχείριση πολυμέσων και δεν θα επηρεάσει τις υπάρχουσες αναρτήσεις.
hide_file.hide_success: Η απόκρυψη του αρχείου ήταν επιτυχής
hide_file.hide_fail: Η απόκρυψη του αρχείου "{fileName}" δεν ήταν δυνατή

upload_errors.forbidden_type: Uploading files of this type is not allowed.
upload_errors.unsupported_type: Upload adapter does not support the provided mime type: {mime}.
upload_errors.could_not_detect_mime: Could not detect the MIME type of this file, please try again.
